Posts.Content: hi phyllis.Ihave to be on herceptin for 1 year given by drip.They say it is a wonderful drug . We get it in Scotland but you have to fight for it in England.Shocking really when you think about the number of women this drug saves. Iam on tamoxifen for 5 years.Itoo had chemo and radiotherapy with only 1 lymph node starting to become infected.They told me this is normal practice.We don't getto pick our onc we are given one lots of hugs phyl41
Posts.Title: her2 positive/ breast cancer

Posts.Content: hello all , my bc is her2 positive.Anybody else the same? Iread in our newspaper that this is an aggressive type.I was caught very early so had a lumpectomy and only 1 lymph node had just started to become infected .Chemo, radio, tamoxifen for 5 years now and on herceptin followed surgery.Ifeel dumped as doctors say i am doing great and then papers print this.Please reply
Posts.Title: her2 positive

Posts.Content: hi all . Thanks for replying. I feel more positive today and i am not going to believe what newspapers say. I am going to continue just listening to my doctors. They know best and if they thought i was worse than i thought they would have told me so. Take care everyone. Talk soon
Posts.Title: her2 positive

Posts.Content: hi elaine, sorry to hear that your husband is ill too. You must have alot on your mind just now. My thoughts are with you and please let me know how you get on love phyl41
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: good luck with your tests tomorrow. I was caught early and my treatment started as soon as i was over my lumpectomy. Doctors say i have a good chance of it not returning. Good luck and stay positive keep in touch phyl
Posts.Title: First Mammogram Results (need some advice) 1 2

Posts.Content: sorry to hear the effect herceptin had on you.All i can do is have my regular heart scans and hope for the best. How long were you on herceptin before this was noticed?
Posts.Title: her2 positive/ breast cancer

Posts.Content: hi all , anyone else her2 positive? would love to hear from you.
Posts.Title: her2 positive/ breast cancer

Posts.Content: i had my biopsy and got my results on the friday. Good luck , i hope everything turns out fine. Keep positive.
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: hi elaine why won't you ever visit Scotland now You are going to get through this and get on with your life. Look at me, i was diagnosed in sept 06 and i am going to China this september so think positive. Let me know how you get on phyl
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: good news for you elaine.Keep my fingers crossed for your husband phyl41
Posts.Title: How long for results of breast biopsy?

Posts.Content: Hi ladies has anyone else gained weight whilst on Herceptin ? I asked my chemo nurse and she said she didn't know if this was a side effect Just wondered if anyone else had this problem. I have put on 2 stone so far. Hope that you are all well Best wishes phyl41
Posts.Title: Weight gain and Herceptin

Posts.Content: good luck for monday beppie.I'm sure everything will be okay.Please let me know how you get on. all the best phyl41
Posts.Title: Lump is spindle-shaped? What does this mean?

Posts.Content: hi beppie, i had my first mammogram in sept 05 and in sept 07 i had an ultrasound exam because it was under a year since my last one. Thats when early breast cancer was discovered.I was lucky as my mammogram wasn't due for another 2yrs. I had a lumpectomy and 1 lymph node had started to become infected.Chemo and radiotherapy followed.Ididn't mind the radio because i felt the benefits out weighed the after effects.Iam on tamoxifen and have been fine apart from the hot flushes and i am now on herceptin as my cancer was her2 positive.We tend not to have second opinions here. Ijust put all my faith in the oncologist i was given . I hope everything works out for you .Keep us posted. I will be thinking of you best wishes phyl41
Posts.Title: Ductile Carcinoma 1 2 3

Posts.Content: hi beppie, hope that you are doing okay. I have not been on for a while as my computer was getting fixed.Remember to ask about lowering the dosage if it is too strong for your bloods to cope with. Keep me posted thinking of you phyl41
Posts.Title: Ductile Carcinoma 1 2 3

Posts.Content: hi i had a lumpectomy and have had my chemo , radiotherapy, am om tamoxifen and herceptin and my breast still feels swollen and kind of heavy. Doctor says it is normal
Posts.Title: Fluid in breast after having lump removed

Posts.Content: Hi all hope that you are doing okay. It has been a while since i have posted. I gained weight during the time that i was on Herceptin and my doctor's couldn't say for sure if it was the drug that caused this I finished my treatment in may and have now found myself losing the weight Has anyone out there found this too Again i hope everyone is doing great and having as happy a life as they can
Posts.Title: Herceptin weight gain then loss

Posts.Content: hi beppie i know that with my chemo they had to lower my dose because it was too strong for me and was lowering the neutrophils in my blood too far. They can seemingly do that and it still has the same effect on the cancer cells that is if there are any remaining after surgery. Its a lot to take in isn't it They also cut the number of blasts of radiotherapy to save me to much discomfort. So they can do alot to help Well enough depressing talk, have a lovely weekend and keep in touch best wishes phyl41
Posts.Title: Ductile Carcinoma 1 2 3

Posts.Content: hi there thanks for the reply. I am 42 and it just appeared back unexpectedly. Have you ever heard of that happening. The doctor has me worried and is sending me for internals and womb biopsies but i like to think its just my body recovered from the effects of the chemo
Posts.Title: Periods after Chemo

Posts.Content: hi all just to let you know i am going for my tests tomorrow .......... no more bleeding since the last one and that only lasted 6 days and then stopped.....thats what made makes me think it was just a period .........also at that time i was on antibiotics and was wondering if these could have interfered with the working of the tamoxifen ..... i will let you all know how i get on tomorrow
Posts.Title: Periods after Chemo

Posts.Content: thanks marie. I am glad its working for your mum too. Does she noitce any change in her weight ???
Posts.Title: Herceptin weight gain then loss

Posts.Content: :wave hi folks it has been a while since i have posted on this site . I finished my chemo 2 years ago and low and behold my periods have returned. Has this happened to anyone else out there. The only treatment i am still on is Tamoxifen. Saw the doctor today and now she is refering me to the hospital for examinations but i feel well. It just came on like a normal monthly cycle and i had the mood swings before hand. Any advise would be appreciated Thanks for listening xx
Posts.Title: Periods after Chemo

Posts.Content: hi there, i can't answer your question about teenagers getting breast cancer but you have done the best thing getting medical help.I just want to wish your daughter the best of luck and i will be praying for you both. Keep positive and god forbid that it is bc ,your daughter will come through it. Keep us posted and let us know how she gets on. Will be thinking about you both Best wishes phyl41
Posts.Title: Teenage Daughter

Posts.Content: does anyone else suffer from this.I have finished my chemo, radiotherapy and am on tamoxifen and herceptin. I saw my breast surgeon 3 weeks ago and he said i was doing great but you all know you can't stop worrying.Could it be the treatment thats causing this heavy feeling?
Posts.Title: Heaviness in breast after lumpectomy and treatment

Posts.Content: Hi Beppie just thought i would check and see how you are doing . How's the treatment going and are you keeping well.Hows your summer going. We have had rain for most of ours. I can't wait to go to China and maybe get a few hot days.Let me know how you are best wishes phyl41
